mapper.insert: insert into Paragraph (p_num, m_num, p_content, p_sentence) values (#{p_num},#{m_num},#{p_content},#{p_sentence})

insert into Quiz (q_num, p_num, q_quest, q_wrong1, q_wrong2,q_wrong3, q_wrong4, q_answer, q_comment, q_date, q_type, m_num) values (#{q_num},#{p_num},#{q_quest}, #{q_wrong1},#{q_wrong2}, #{q_wrong3}, #{q_wrong4}, #{q_answer}, #{q_comment}, now(),#{q_type}, #{m_num})
